markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Soaring](/Equipment.aspx?ID=920)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 139 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 3,750 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A set of _soaring_ armor helps you fly faster and protects you and nearby allies from falling. While wearing _soaring_ armor, you gain a +10-foot item bonus to your fly Speed, if you have one. As normal, if your fly Speed is based on your land Speed and you already have an item bonus to your land Speed, these bonuses aren't cumulative.

<document level="2" id="action-706" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Soaring
